text: I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life... it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true.
author: Walt Disney

text: Prospering just doesn't have to do with money.
author: Joel Osteen

text: I mean, I do think at a certain point you've made enough money.
author: Barack Obama

text: If advertisers spent the same amount of money on improving their products as they do on advertising then they wouldn't have to advertise them.
author: Will Rogers

text: The Internet didn't get invented on its own. Government research created the Internet so that all the companies could make money off the Internet. The point is, is that when we succeed, we succeed because of our individual initiative, but also because we do things together.
author: Barack Obama
